section.title: Important changes
section.para: With this release we are finally ready, after many years of work, to encourage all onCourse users to begin using the web browser version of onCourse. There are still some small parts of the application left to port over, like the Trial Balance and some other finance related exports, but onCourse is now 98% completed in the web browser. We're very proud of our work up to this point, and would also like to thank those of you who helped shape this new onCourse with your excellent feedback and suggestions.

section.title: Major features
section.para: Checkout has now been added to onCourse, replacing the old Quick Enrol with something that is faster, better and easier to use. We've covered the four main steps of the Checkout process on our YouTube Channel, you can watch the whole Checkout playlist here.
